**Creative Prompt for LinkedInâ€‘Testimonial Image** *Campaign: â€œOur clients trust PLâ€¯Capitalâ€™s adaptive, quantâ€‘driven strategies for consistent alpha.â€* --- ### 1. Core Message **â€œConsistent alpha is possible when you partner with PLâ€¯Capitalâ€™s adaptive, quantâ€‘driven strategies.â€** --- ### 2. Visual Direction | Element | Description | |---------|-------------| | **Overall Look & Feel** | Ultraâ€‘clean, dataâ€‘centric corporate visual that feels both sophisticated and approachable. Think a modern financialâ€‘technology office with a subtle â€œdigitalâ€‘waveâ€ motif that suggests adaptability and precision. | | **Color Palette** | Primary: Deep navy (#0A1F44) and crisp white. Accent: Emeraldâ€‘green (#00B894) for growth, and light teal (#7ED6DF) for technology. Use a gradient overlay (navy â†’ teal) behind key text to draw focus. | | **Composition** | 1ï¸âƒ£ Leftâ€‘third: A confident, diverse client (midâ€‘30sâ€“50s, genderâ€‘balanced) looking at a sleek tablet.
2ï¸âƒ£ Center: A semiâ€‘transparent dataâ€‘visualization panel (line chart, heatâ€‘map, and algorithmic â€œpulseâ€ icons) that wraps around the clientâ€™s view, showing rising performance curves.
3ï¸âƒ£ Rightâ€‘third: PLâ€¯Capitalâ€™s logo (white on navy) with a short testimonial quote in elegant sansâ€‘serif.
4ï¸âƒ£ Bottom overlay: Callâ€‘toâ€‘action buttonâ€‘style graphic (â€œDiscover Adaptive Alphaâ€). | | **Lighting & Mood** | Soft, diffused natural light from a large window, combined with subtle cool backâ€‘lighting on the data panel to create a highâ€‘tech ambience. Mood: confident, trustworthy, forwardâ€‘looking. | | **Style** | Photorealistic rendering with a slight isometric tilt on the data panel to give depth. Minimalist UI elements (rounded corners, thin lines). No stockâ€‘photo clichÃ©s â€“ the client should look authentic, not posed. | | **Typography** | Headline: â€œConsistent Alpha, Adaptive Strategyâ€ â€“ Montserrat Bold, white, 48â€¯pt.
Quote: â€œPLâ€¯Capitalâ€™s quantâ€‘driven approach has delivered steady outperformance for our portfolio.â€ â€“ Lora Regular, emeraldâ€‘green, 28â€¯pt.
CTA: â€œDiscover Adaptive Alphaâ€ â€“ Open Sans Semiâ€‘Bold, navy on teal button, 24â€¯pt. | --- ### 3. Tone & Voice Professional, confident, and dataâ€‘driven while remaining personable. The visual should convey thoughtâ€‘leadership and reliability, not hype. Use subtle optimism (green accents) to suggest growth without overstating. --- ### 4. Key Elements (MUSTâ€‘Include) 1. **Diverse client figure** (realistic, not generic silhouette). 2. **Quantitative data overlay** (line chart trending upward, algorithmic nodes). 3. **PLâ€¯Capital logo** (white version on navy background). 4. **Short testimonial quote** (as above, or a variation). 5. **CTA button** (â€œDiscover Adaptive Alphaâ€). 6. **Brand colors** (navy, emeraldâ€‘green, teal). 7. **LinkedInâ€‘friendly dimensions** (see Technical Specs). --- ### 5. Call to Action **â€œTap â€˜Learn Moreâ€™ to see how our adaptive, quantâ€‘driven strategies can deliver consistent alpha for your portfolio.â€** Visually, the CTA button should appear clickable with a subtle dropâ€‘shadow and a hoverâ€‘effect suggestion (e.g., a faint glow). --- ### 6. Platform Optimization â€“ LinkedIn * **Aspect Ratio**: 1.91:1 (recommended 1200â€¯Ã—â€¯628â€¯px) â€“ fits LinkedIn feed and Sponsored Content. * **File Type**: PNG (lossless) for crisp text; fallback JPEG â‰¤â€¯200â€¯KB for faster loading. * **Altâ€‘Text**: â€œProfessional client reviewing PL Capitalâ€™s adaptive, quantâ€‘driven performance dashboard, with a rising alpha chart and a testimonial quote.â€ * **Copy Overlay Limit**: Keep onâ€‘image text â‰¤â€¯20â€¯% of total image area (LinkedIn best practice). * **Brand Tag**: Include â€œ#PLCapital #QuantAlpha #AdaptiveInvestingâ€ in the post copy, not on the image. --- ### 7. Script/Copy (Overlay Text) **Topâ€‘Left (Headline):** *Consistent Alpha, Adaptive Strategy* **Center (Quote Box):** *â€œPL Capitalâ€™s quantâ€‘driven approach has delivered steady outperformance for our portfolio.â€* **Bottomâ€‘Right (CTA Button):** *Discover Adaptive Alpha* *Post Copy (for LinkedIn):* > Our clients trust PLâ€¯Capitalâ€™s adaptive, quantâ€‘driven strategies to generate consistent alpha in any market environment. Ready to experience dataâ€‘powered performance? Click â€œLearn More.â€ --- ### 8. Technical Specs | Spec | Detail | |------|--------| | **Aspect Ratio** | 1.91â€¯:â€¯1 (1200â€¯Ã—â€¯628â€¯px) â€“ LinkedIn feed | | **Resolution** | 72â€¯dpi (web) â€“ ensure crisp vector text | | **File Format** | PNG (primary), JPEG â‰¤â€¯200â€¯KB (fallback) | | **Color Mode** | RGB | | **Maximum File Size** | 5â€¯MB (LinkedIn limit) | | **Safe Zone** | Keep critical elements >â€¯40â€¯px from image edges to avoid cropping on mobile | | **Duration Markers** | N/A (static image). If repurposed as a 30â€‘second looped video, animate the data panel rising and a subtle pulse on the CTA button â€“ start at 0â€¯s (static), 5â€¯s (chart animates), 20â€¯s (CTA glows), 30â€¯s (fade out). | | **Export Naming** | `PLCapital_LinkedIn_Testimonial_ConsistentAlpha_YYYYMMDD.png` | --- **Ready to Deploy:** Feed the above visual description into your preferred AI image generator (Midjourney, DALLÂ·E, Stable Diffusion) using the exact phrasing in the **Visual Direction** table. 1-1764064680563.topic: Generate ONE concise campaign topic (maximum 15 words) for PL Capital.
1-1764064680563.creativePrompt:
**Prompt for Generating a Concise PLâ€¯Capital Campaign Topic (â‰¤â€¯15â€¯words)**  

You are a senior brand strategist for **PLâ€¯Capital**. Using the brand guidelines below, craft **ONE** clear, compelling campaign topic that will serve as the headline for a brandâ€‘awareness initiative aimed at all clients on LinkedIn. The topic must:

* Be **15 words or fewer** (including spaces and punctuation).  
* Reflect PLâ€¯Capitalâ€™s core values â€“ **Trust, Innovation, Performance, Clientâ€‘First**.  
* Convey the idea of **adaptive, dataâ€‘driven strategies** that deliver consistent alpha.  
* Use a **professional, trustworthy, and approachable** tone.  
* Incorporate the brandâ€™s **primary colors** (Navyâ€¯#0e0e6a, Blueâ€¯#3c3cf8) or **accent colors** (Tealâ€¯#00d084, Greenâ€¯#66e766) in any implied visual language (e.g., â€œblueâ€‘chipâ€, â€œtealâ€‘edgeâ€).  
* Align with the **clean, modern, corporate** visual style and the **Figtree** typography family (you may reference â€œFigtreeâ€‘styled headlineâ€).  

**Output format (exactly as shown):**  

```
Campaign Topic: <your 15â€‘word (or fewer) headline>
```

*Do not include any additional explanation, hashtags, or emojis.*

The chart bars are teal and green, with subtle motionâ€‘blur lines to suggest growth.

â€¢ Background navy gradient fades from #0e0e6a (top) to a slightly lighter #1a1a8f (bottom) to add depth.

â€¢ Minimalist iconography â€“ use flatâ€‘design icons for â€œstrategyâ€, â€œperformanceâ€, â€œtrustâ€.
â€¢ All text set in **Figtree** (weights: Bold for headline, Medium for subâ€‘headline, Regular for body). | | **Imagery Details** | â€¢ Hero: professional attire (navy blazer, light shirt), slight smile, eyes focused on the holographic chart.
â€¢ Holographic chart: 3â€‘D bars (teal, green) with numeric labels (â‚¹1â€¯Cr+, 12â€¯% YoY, etc.) floating in midâ€‘air, slight glow effect.
â€¢ Background: faint abstract map of India formed by lowâ€‘opacity lines, indicating geographic reach. | | **Text Overlays** | â€¢ **Headline (28â€¯pt, Figtree Bold, White)**: â€œAdaptive Alpha for â‚¹1â€¯Cr+ Portfoliosâ€

The copy uses confident verbs (â€œUnlockâ€, â€œDeliverâ€, â€œOutpaceâ€) and quantifiable language (â€œâ‚¹1â€¯Cr+â€, â€œ12â€¯% YoYâ€).
